BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: [now dev] Fix creating duplicate blocking builds upon bootup (#2618) PR #2562 caused an issue with blocking builds at bootup being built twice, which is problematic when i.e. running `yarn` simultaneously on the same directory causing cache corruption issues.
